question: What will happen if a wire of length L is cut into two or more parts?
option1: each part can hold half the weight as full length wire
option2: each part can hold the same weight as full length wire
option3: each part can hold twice the weight as full length wire
answer: each part can hold the same weight as full length wire
explanation: If a wire of length L is cut into two or more parts, then it's each part can hold the same weight. Since breaking force is independent of the length of wire.
